price: Nokorε sε, wͻn a wͻagye adie na wͻredi dwuma pa no wͻ akatua a εtoͻ ntwa da.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ لَهُمۡ أَجۡرٌ غَيۡرُ مَمۡنُونٖ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti lahum ajrun ghayru mamnūnin
